ratings.question_text: Your level of engagement with the course was:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
The course was well organized to facilitate student learning.
I received clear feedback that improved my learning.
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the level of intellectual challenge of this course was:
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the workload of this course was:

narratives.question_text: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
comments: Through the three semesters that WGSS guides you through the Senior Essay, I have learned an incredible amount about how to conduct research, sustain my own personal stamina, hone an argument that holds together over dozens of pages, and, ultimately, write a 65-page essay. It has inspired me to eventually go back to grad school.
I learned how to carry out long term research and how to utilize that research to write a lengthy essay

I think that the senior essay really forced me to see a big project through to completion. I had never really attempted anything as ambitious before, so I learned a ton about managing myself on projects, working ahead, and breaking things down into manageable chunks. I think this project was the most intellectually difficult things I've done at Yale, and definitely the most satisfying to complete.

narratives.question_text: What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
comments: The strengths are the care and support that faculty provide in writing the essay. Joe fischels reminder emails and weekly writing boot camps were so helpful.

I think the lack of a hard word limit was a strength! I felt like I had a lot of freedom to write what I thought the essay needed to say. One recommendation would be to add a short bibliographic essay at the end. Some of my friends in HSHM really enjoyed writing theirs, and I think it would be useful to future students to see how senior essays get put together.

narratives.question_text: Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
comments: I would reccomend the essay because wgss provides the training and support to write a good essay
be a wgss major!!! It rocks and the thesis is so well supported - amazing opportunity
The Senior Essay is required for WGSS majors so you don't really have a choice! WRITE EARLY AND OFTEN, use a citation manager, and stay calm. The senior essay is intimidating but you can do it!
